GRID.name: Pending Tasks
GRID.where: (approve_status = 'D') AND (approval_group NOT IN (SELECT coalesce(approval_group, 0) FROM approvals WHERE entity_id IS NOT NULL))

GRID.name: Notice
GRID.params: client_inspection_id, notice_type_id, is_notice, is_penalty, is_revocation, has_inspection

FORM.name: Contractor
FORM.COMBOLIST: category_applied A - IMWE B - IMW C - IMW
category_recomm A - IMWE B - IMW C - IMW
category_approved A - IMWE B - IMW C - IMW

GRID.name: POST CLC Decision
GRID.where: clc_id > 0 AND client_license_id NOT IN (SELECT client_license_id FROM clc_history)

GRID.name: Pending Tasks
GRID.where: (approve_status = 'D') AND (entity_type_id = '56') AND (approval_group NOT IN (SELECT coalesce(approval_group,0) FROM approvals WHERE entity_id IS NOT NULL))

GRID.name: POST CLC Decision
GRID.where: clc_id > 0 AND client_license_id NOT IN (SELECT client_license_id FROM clc_history)

GRID.name: Pending Tasks
GRID.where: (approve_status = 'D') AND (license_type_id=18) and (approval_group NOT IN (SELECT coalesce(approval_group, 0) FROM approvals WHERE entity_id IS NOT NULL))

GRID.name: TAC Decision
GRID.where: clc_id > 0 AND client_license_id NOT IN (SELECT client_license_id FROM clc_history)

FORM.name: Edit Applicant
FORM.COMBOLIST: end_year_month January February March April May June July August September October November December

FORM.name: Edit Applicant
FORM.COMBOLIST: end_year_month January February March April May June July August September October November December

GRID.name: Licensees
GRID.where: client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_license WHERE client_license.is_active ='1')

GRID.name: License Generation
GRID.where: license_id IN (131,132) AND is_license_active = '0' AND is_offer_sent = '1'

GRID.name: Notification
GRID.where: (department_id = 4) AND (is_offer_sent = '0') AND (is_archived = '0') AND (client_license_id NOT IN (select client_license_id from license_payment_header where is_paid = '0'))

FORM.name: Qos Parameter
FORM.COMBOLIST: target_operator Equal To Greater or Equal Less or Equal

FORM.name: User
FORM.COMBOLIST: function_role Telecom Licensing Postal Licensing Compliance Type Approval Certification And Numbering CA System Admin

FORM.name: New Applicant
FORM.COMBOLIST: end_year_month January February March April May June July August September October November December

FORM.name: New Applicant
FORM.COMBOLIST: end_year_month January February March April May June July August September October November December

GRID.name: Revocation Candidate
GRID.where: (activeperiod = '1') AND (forlcs = '1') AND (conditionscompliant = '0') AND (CONDITIONSNOTIFICATION = '1') and TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD/Mon/YYYY') > = CONDITIONSEDEADLINE

GRID.name: Client
GRID.where: (is_illegal = '0') and (COMPLIANT = '1') AND (client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_license WHERE client_license.is_active ='1'))

GRID.name: Client
GRID.where: (is_illegal = '0') AND (client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_license WHERE client_license.is_active ='1'))

GRID.name: Licensees
GRID.where: client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_license WHERE client_license.is_active ='1')
